CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based conjugated polymers used for polymer solar cells , demonstrating the great potential of spirobifluorene moiety as an electron - donating unit for the construction of main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymers for high performance polymer solar cells .

Let's think step by step.

1. Spirobifluorene: This is the material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is described as a moiety (a small functional group) that acts as an electron-donating unit in the construction of main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers for high performance polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
